<file>
00001| import './globals.css';
00002| import type { Metadata } from 'next';

00004| import { Toaster } from '@/components/ui/sonner';
00005| import { SessionProvider } from '@/components/providers/session-provider';
00006| 
00007| const inter = Inter({ subsets: ['latin'] });
00008| 
00009| export const metadata: Metadata = {
00010|   title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',
00011|   description: 'The European translation platform built for European languages and culture. Professional domain expertise, custom glossaries, and intelligent AI. Based in Europe, for Europe.',
00012|   keywords: 'european translation, EU languages, european translator, linguala, multilingual europe, professional translation, domain expertise',
00013|   authors: [{ name: 'Linguala Europe' }],
00014|   creator: 'Linguala',
00015|   publisher: 'Linguala Europe',
00016|   robots: 'index, follow',
00017|   openGraph: {
00018|     type: 'website',
00019|     locale: 'en_EU',
00020|     url: 'https://linguala.eu',
00021|     title: 'Linguala - European AI Translation Platform',

00028|     description: 'European translation platform built for European languages and culture',

00032|

00037| };
00038| 
00039| export default function RootLayout({

00044|   return (

</file>
